archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0485
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a transitioning customer, I want to place a single order for all my services while transitioning base migrating service and all upgrades; I want the system to sequence them and workout accordingly

properties.value: This relates to a possible speed change for a customer when moving to the new DX plan eg fibre 50/100 to fibre 100/100. What if upgrade requires technology/CPE change? Not allowed. Is the orchestration done as part of transition app (starting separate orders: activation + upgrade)? To be checked if it is possible within BSS. Open point for Comarch to discuss internally: how can we create the first order without configuring all the legacy offerings (there is a lot more in legacy than will be in DX).

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
